00035 bool loadPGM(std::istream&is, DMatrix<Numeric>& matrix);

00048 // Implementation
00049 
00050 template<typename Numeric>
00051 bool loadPGM(std::istream&is, DMatrix<Numeric>& matrix) {
00052     std::string magicNumber;
00053     is >> magicNumber;
00054     
00055     if(magicNumber!= "P5") {
00056         // RDK_ERROR_STREAM("I expected a magic of P5, instead of '"<<magicNumber<<"'");
00057         return false;
00058     }
00059     
00060     RDK2::TextUtils::consumeWhitespace(is);
00061     
00062     int width = -1, height = -1, maxVal = -1;
00063     
00064     if(!(is>>width)) {
00065         // RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not read width");
00066         return false;
00067     }   
00068     
00069     //RDK_TRACE_PRINTF("Read width=%d", width);
00070     RDK2::TextUtils::consumeWhitespace(is);
00071     
00072     if(!(is>>height)) {
00073         // RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not read height");
00074         return false;
00075     }   
00076     
00077     //RDK_TRACE_PRINTF("Read height=%d", height);
00078     RDK2::TextUtils::consumeWhitespace(is);
00079     
00080     if(!(is>>maxVal)) {
00081         // RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not read maxVal");
00082         return false;
00083     }   
00084     
00085     // RDK_TRACE_PRINTF("Read maxVal=%d", maxVal);
00086     
00087     if(width<=0 || height <=0) {
00088         // RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Bad width, height = %d, %d", width, height);
00089         return 0;
00090     }
00091         
00092     #define EXPECT_MAXVAL 255
00093     if(maxVal!=EXPECT_MAXVAL) {
00094         // RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("I expected a maxVal of %d instead of %d.", EXPECT_MAXVAL, maxVal);
00095         return 0;
00096     }
00097     
00098     is.get();
00099     
00100     matrix = DMatrix<Numeric>(height, width);
00101     
00102     for(int y=0;y<height;y++)
00103         for(int x=0;x<width;x++)  {
00104             int c = is.get();
00105             matrix[y][x] = c;
00106         }
00107         
00108     return true;
00109 }
00110 
00111 template<typename Numeric>
00112 bool loadPGM(const char*file, DMatrix<Numeric>& matrix) {
00113     std::ifstream ifs(file);
00114     if(!ifs) {
00115         //RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not open file  '"<<file<<"'.");
00116         return false;
00117     }
00118     
00119     return loadPGM(ifs, matrix);
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 template <typename Numeric>
00124 bool savePGM(const DMatrix<Numeric>&matrix, std::ostream&os) {
00125     int width  = matrix.columns();
00126     int height = matrix.rows();
00127     
00128         os << "P5"             << std::endl
00129         << "# DMatrix "        << std::endl
00130         << width <<" "<<height << std::endl
00131         << "255"               << std::endl;
00132     
00133     for(int y=0;y<height;y++)
00134     for(int x=0;x<width;x++)
00135         os.put(matrix[y][x]);
00136         
00137     return !os.fail();
00138 }
00139 
00140 template <class Numeric>
00141 bool savePGM(std::string file, const DMatrix<Numeric>&matrix) {
00142     std::ofstream ofs(file.c_str());
00143     DMatrix<unsigned char> m = 
00144         RDK2::Geometry::normalize(matrix, (unsigned char)0,(unsigned char)255);
00145     return savePGM(m, ofs);
00146 }
